## Overview

The cost benchmarking exercise proceeds in eight (8) parts.

1. ATMs
2. Cash in transit
3. Household costs
4. Currency operations
5. Tax gap
6. Fraud
7. Foregone growth
8. Seigniorage (benefits)

## Methodology

The source data and analysis for each of these methods are described in markdown documents that accompany the main findings.
